description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the remote code execution vulnerability associated with the Xbox Wireless Adapter, you should apply the updates specified in the KB articles as follows:

1. Download and install the KB-5040442 update to address security issues related to the use after free vulnerability.
2. Apply the KB-5040431 update as well, as it may provide further enhancements or mitigations.
3. Restart your system after applying these updates to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- These updates address known vulnerabilities that could lead to remote code execution when using the Xbox Wireless Adapter.
- For further information, refer to the official [Microsoft Security Update Guide](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-38078).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is updated with the latest build versions [10, 0, 22631, 3880], [10, 0, 22000, 3079], or [10, 0, 22621, 3880].
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
